googletagmanager-desc: Inserts the Google Tag Manager script
right-noanalytics: Exempted from web analytics tracking of any kind
googletagmanager-disabled-for-user: Tracking is disabled for this user
googletagmanager-disabled-for-page: Tracking is disabled on this page
googletagmanager-error-not-configured: Error: you must set $wgGoogleTagManagerContainerID to your Google Tag Manager container ID.
